name: Maxthon 2 Browser Skin File
summary: Learn about .M2S files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: M2S files support .PNG images, which allows buttons and icons referenced by the skin to use different levels of transparency.

description: Theme or skin for the Maxthon 2 Web browser; used to customize the look and feel of the Maxthon browser interface; includes the default settings for the skin and references to images used by the skin.
